title: Snowstorm Skins Haven't Refreshed To Date.
body:
AFAIK, the description on league's site and any other description I've seen seems to say the 6 sales you get for personal purchase will be "daily" or refresh. I've been waiting a few days and for 3 (or 4?) and have had the same sales. 

I may be wrong but I thought I'd make sure.

replies.body:
The Snowdown Shop sales do not refresh. What they were talking about are the Snowstorm daily deals.

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/store/sales/caution-snowstorm-sale-incoming
